It offers visitors a significantly less celebrated but nonetheless pleasant network of quaint lanes and side streets, majestic panoramas of the Bosphorus, and an impressive assortment of accommodation options for all budgets and tastes.

title: awol at the apex
review: I recently made a trip to Istanbul and thought I would try the Apex Hotel Historical after a recommendation from a friend.  I'm so glad I took their advice.  Firstly, I was very impressed by the airport transfer and  what a wonderful hotel.  The location of this beautiful accomodation is absolutely ideal,  very central and all the stunning attractions are nearby.     The staff were extremely helpful and friendly and straight away I was made to feel very welcome.  On one occasion rather late at night I felt a little hungry so I called reception to ask if there were any snacks available.  The receptionist asked if I wanted anything from outwith the hotel as they were more than happy to satisfy my appetite and within a short period of time the food was delivered to my room.  That's…

title: AMAZING HOTEL
review: Fell upon the Apex in November 07 when soaked and bedraggled a previously booked hotel was full and took us to this one where we were received and welcomed handsomely.  It was indeed like staying at home - with a few catered comforts - but generally left to spend your your time as you will.  Very obliging when services were required and practical advice for getting around.  I was therefore well satisfied with a quiet unassuming hostelry, conveniently placed, once you worked out where you were, which was dead close to all the Sultan Ahmet main attractions.  So impressed was I that I booked it again for a further visit in Feb 08.  A few new faces on the staff but still with that inimitable friendliness and assistance which had made my earlier visit so enjoyable.  The sun was…

title: Excellent Hotel
review: BRIDGET  IRELAND My self and some friends stayed at this fab hotel for 3 nights and  i had to let people know what a great place this is to stay from the time we got there until we left the staff were amazing they were on call 24 hrs booking restaurants telling us the best places to see /room service / nothing was a problem rooms were spotless breakfast was lovely we can highly recommend this hotel  we will be back

title: Birth of a goog place to live in Istanbul...
review: I stayed in the Apex Hotel Historical in January 2008. I had an excellent stay. The rooms are really beautiful, very clean and very comfortable. The staff was very friendly and very helpful from the minute we checked in until the minute we checked out. The atmosphere in the hotel is warm and welcoming.The breakfast was very good.The position of the hotel is perfect, it is in Sultanahmet, very close to Blue Mosque and San Sophia. There is a wonderful view to the sea from terrace bar.   I honestly don’t have one bad word to say about this hotel, everything was excellent, and would recommend it to anyone whether you’re with a group of mates, or on a romantic weekend for two it really is suitable for everyone.

title: Very good client service at Apex Historical
review: With so many unmissable attractions within a mere stroll of each other – and all set around the site of an ancient Byzantine hippodrome – Sultanahmet is an overwhelmingly popular tourist destination, and a prime location for visitors to be wowed on a truly epic scale. Beyond the wonders of the Blue Mosque, the Hagia Sophia, Topkapi Palace, and more, this relatively small area of Istanbul somehow manages to retain an air of peace and calm. It offers visitors a significantly less celebrated but nonetheless pleasant network of quaint lanes and side streets, majestic panoramas of the Bosphorus, and an impressive assortment of accommodation options for all budgets and tastes.

title: Is just perfect
review: Apex Hotel Historical is a small lovely hotel in Sultanahmet, very close to Blue Mosque and other sightseeings (Ayasofya, Topkapi Palace, Yerebatan Sarnici, Grand Bazaar) are in walking distance. Staff was very friendly and helpful, I got answers to all my questions and much more. Rooms were nice and clean and breakfast very good. Actually, my room was cleaned already while I was having breakfast!  There is a great view to the sea from terrace bar. Public transportation also close to the hotel. Can recommend to everyone.

title: best historical hotel in istanbul
review: Everything functioned very well. The room was beautiful and very comfortable. The personnel and the service were excellent. I received all the assistance I could wish for at all hours and by all categories of the personnel and always in a very friendly way. When returning after long days out of the hotel it was like coming home. The atmosphere in the hotel is warm and welcoming.  I want to thank all personnel for making my stay so enjoyable and congratulate the management for having created a hotel environment with the qualities mentioned above.
